name: Mad Town German Stories
description:
Features:
- Huge open world, based on the real city of Munich!
- Shooter from the third person! Shooting with dynamic gameplay and easy management!
- Realistic and beautiful 3D graphics
- A fascinating 3-hour story that will not leave you indifferent!
- You can play offline, without the Internet and wifi!
- Buying houses and real estate!
- A huge arsenal of guns to choose from! What would you prefer: the most powerful pistol in the world or the biggest hand-held minigun?
- More than 30 cars for any choice: both for the city and tracks, and off-road!
- Excellent game, which you can download for free

The plot of the game:
After a long vacation, the main character of the game "Madtown german stories" returns to his hometown Munich, where he meets his old childhood friend Klaus. They have not seen each other for more than 10 years and just wanted to have fun, but things did not go according to plan.
A mysterious enemy tries to hurt Klaus and only you are able to help him. Racing, shooting, action, shop robbery is just a little of what you have to do to find out the main secret: who tried to kill Klaus?

P.S.: Thank you, dear users, for your comments and propositions. That’s very important for us! We’re doing our best to give you pleasure and enjoyment.
